overview: Do you want to build free rapid web based applications? On Oracle Platform? Apexor offers consulting services to bring your enterprise and departmental applications into a collaborative platform. Apex is a rapid web based applications development tool that focusses on business deliverables and allows an IT manager to focus on core business processes rather than web development. Apexor offers our expertise to help you build quick web development inside your startup, mid-size, enterprise or large organization. Contact us at: consulting@apexor.com for more information. http://www.apexor.com
